sys_hub_action_type_definition.description:
Creates a sales order in SAP S/4HANA - RFC.

Inputs :

  • Connection Alias - Connection alias for SAP S/4HANA - RFC.
  • Order Header - Object containing these fields:
    • Object Type
    • Object key
    • Document type of reference object
    • Sales Document Type
    • Collective Number
    • Sales Organization
    • Distribution Channel
    • Division
    • Sales Group
    • Sales Office
    • Requested delivery date
    • Proposed date type
    • Customer Purchase Order Date
    • Customer purchase order type
    • Purchase order number supplement
    • Your Reference
    • Name of orderer
    • Telephone Number
    • Price group (customer)
    • Customer group
    • Sales district
    • Price list type
    • Incoterms (Part 1)
    • Incoterms (Part 2)
    • Terms of Payment Key
    • Delivery block
    • Billing block
    • Order reason
    • Complete delivery
    • Pricing Date
    • Quotation valid from
    • Quotation valid to
    • Valid-from date
    • Valid-to date
    • Customer group 1
    • Customer group 2
    • Customer group 3
    • Customer group 4
    • Customer group 5
    • PO Number
    • Purchase order no.
    • Purchase order date
    • Purchase order type
    • Your reference [ REF_1_S ]
    • SD document categ.
    • Document Date
    • Guarantee
    • Shipping Conditions
    • Description
    • Number of contacts
    • Last contact date
    • Usage
    • MRP for DlvSchType
    • Reference Document
    • CCode to be billed
    • Alt.tax classific.
    • TaxClass2-Cust.
    • TaxClass3-Cust.
    • TaxClass4-Cust.
    • TaxClass5-Cust.
    • TaxClass6-Cust.
    • TaxClass7-Cust.
    • TaxClass8-Cust.
    • TaxClass9-Cust.
    • Reference no.
    • Assignment
    • Preceding doc.categ.
    • Order Combination
    • Invoicing dates
    • Invoice list sched.
    • Man.invoice mainten.
    • Exchange rate-accntg
    • Addit.value days
    • Fixed value date
    • Payment Method
    • Acct Assmt Grp Cust.
    • Exchange rate
    • Billing Date
    • Serv.rendered date
    • Dunning Key
    • Dunning Block
    • Paymt guarant. proc.
    • Department
    • Receiving point
    • Financial doc. no.
    • Condition group 1
    • Condition group 2
    • Condition group 3
    • Condition group 4
    • Condition group 5
    • Delivery time
    • Document Currency
    • ISO code currency
    • Created By
    • Tax depart. country
    • Tax dest. country
    • EU triangular deal
    • Master contract
    • Group Ref. Procedure
    • Check partner auth.
    • CmlQtyDate
    • Version
    • Notification
    • WBS element
    • Exchange rate-accntg
    • Exchange rate
    • char12
    • CGPL_GUID
    • Original system
    • Currency
    • ISO Code
    • Shipping type
    • Special proc. indicator
    • Reference
    • Requested dely time
    • Accounting Indicator
    • Posting Date
    • Treasury Account Symbol
    • Business Event TCode
    • Modification Allowed
    • Cancellation Allowed
    • Payment methods
    • Business Partner No.
    • Reporting Frequency
    • Mandate Reference
    • SD Document Cat [ SD_DOC_CAT_LONG ]
    • SD Document Cat [ REFDOC_CAT_LONG ]
    • Incoterms Version
    • Incoterms Location 1
    • Incoterms Location 2
  • Item Data - Complex object containing these fields:
    • Sales Document Item
    • Higher-level item
    • Purchase Order Item
    • Material
    • Alternative to item
    • Customer material
    • Batch
    • Delivery group
    • Part.Dlv./Item
    • Reason for rejection
    • Block
    • Billing Date
    • Plant
    • Storage Location
    • Target quantity
    • Target quantity UoM
    • Target UoM qty in ISO code

    • Material group 1
    • Material group 2
    • Material group 3
    • Material group 4
    • Material group 5

    • PO Number
    • Purchase Order Date
    • Purchase order type

    • Purchase order date

    • Your reference [ REF_1_S ]
    • Purch. order item no
    • Price group
    • Customer group
    • Sales district
    • Price List

    • Incoterms (Part 2)

    • Invoicing dates
    • Invoice list sched.
    • Man.invoice mainten.

    • Denominator

    • Net weight
    • Weight Unit

    • Volume
    • Volume Unit
    • Volume unit ISO
    • Delivery Priority
    • Shipping Point/Receiving Pt
    • Route
    • Created By
    • Tax classification [ TAX_CLASS1 ]
    • Tax classification [ TAX_CLASS2 ]
    • Tax classification [ TAX_CLASS3 ]
    • Tax classification [ TAX_CLASS4 ]
    • Tax classification [ TAX_CLASS5 ]
    • Tax classification [ TAX_CLASS6 ]
    • Tax classification [ TAX_CLASS7 ]
    • Tax classification [ TAX_CLASS8 ]
    • Tax classification [ TAX_CLASS9 ]

    • Valuation Type
    • Fixed date and qty
    • BOM explosion number

    • Requirements type

    • Overhead key
    • Costing Sheet
    • Material freight grp
    • PlanDelSchedInstruct
    • Sequence number
    • Billing form
    • DIP Profile
    • Rev. recognition cat.
    • Acc. period start date rule
    • Pricing Ref. Matl
    • Object Type
    • Key
    • Logical System
    • Order probability
    • Max.Part.Deliveries
    • CFOP
    • ICMS law
    • IPI law
    • Tax code
    • Module
    • Component quantity
    • Currency amount in BAPI interfaces
    • Document Currency
    • ISO code currency
    • Profit Center
    • Order
    • WBS element
    • Depreciation percentage
    • Reference Document
    • Preceding doc.categ.
    • Preceding doc.categ.
    • Customer material
    • Exchange rate-accntg
    • Exchange rate
    • Item indicator
    • Value contract no.
    • Value contract item
    • Configuration ID
    • Instance Number
    • Material Number [ MAT_EXT ]
    • GUID (External) [ MAT_GUID ]
    • Version Number [ MAT_VERS ]
    • Material Number
    • GUID (External) [ P_MAT_GUID ]
    • Version Number [ P_MAT_VERS ]
    • Functional Area
    • Alternative BOM
    • Character Field of Length
    • EAN/UPC
    • Catalog
    • Shipping type
    • Special proc. indicator
    • Functional Area [ FUNC_AREA_LONG ]
    • Billing Relevance
    • Usage of HL item
    • CGPL_GUID
    • Usage
    • CFOP
    • Selection ID
    • Material entered
    • Logical System
    • Item usage
    • ISS Law
    • Material Number
    • GUID (External) [ MAT_ENTRD_GUID ]
    • Version Number
    • Tax type
    • Reason 0 VAT
    • Activity Code GI Tax
    • Distribution Type
    • Tax rel. classif.
    • Accounting Indicator
    • Abb. Complaints Reason
    • Fund
    • Funds center
    • Commitment item
    • Grant
    • Budget Period
    • COFINS Law
    • PIS Law
    • Treasury Account Symbol
    • Business Event TCode
    • Modification Allowed
    • Cancellation Allowed
    • Payment methods
    • Business Partner No.
    • Reporting Frequency
    • Mandate Reference
    • Requirement Segment
    • Sublevel Prefix (TP)
    • Agency ID (TP)
    • AllcTrnsfrAgncy (TP)
    • Begin Prd Avail (TP)
    • End Prd Avail (TP)
    • Avail Type Code (TP)
    • Main Account (TP)
    • Subaccount (TP)
    • BusinessEvtTypCd(TP)
    • Rev.Acc. Reference ID
    • Rev.Acc. Reference Type
    • SD Document Cat.
    • Incoterms Version
    • Incoterms Location 1
    • Incoterms Location 2
    • Material
    • Pricing Ref. Matl
    • Material entered
    • Order Quantity
    • Order Unit
    • Requirement Segment
  • Document Partner - Complex object containing these fields:
    • Partner Function
    • Customer
    • Item (SD)
    • Form of address
    • Name
    • Name 2
    • Name 3
    • Name 4
    • Street
    • Country Key
    • Country ISO
    • Postal Code
    • P.O. Box Postal Code
    • P.O. Box city
    • City
    • District
    • Region
    • PO Box
    • Telephone 1
    • Telephone 2
    • Telebox number
    • Fax Number
    • Teletex number
    • Telex number
    • Language Key
    • Lang. (ISO 639)
    • Unloading Point
    • Transportation Zone
    • Tax Jurisdiction
    • Address
    • Home address
    • Address Type
    • Address origin
    • Address no.
    • Object Type
    • Key
    • Logical System
  •  Schedule Lines - Complex object containing these fields:
    • Sales Document Item
    • Schedule Line Number
    • Delivery Date
    • Date type
    • Arrival time
    • Order quantity
    • Delivery block
    • Sched.line category
    • Transptn Plang Date
    • Material Avail. Date
    • Loading Date
    • Goods Issue Date
    • Transp. Plan. Time
    • Matl Staging Time
    • Loading Time
    • Goods Issue Time
    • Object Type
    • Key
    • Logical System
    • Delivery Date
    • Arrival time
    • Rel. Type
    • Schedule line type
  • Additional Fields - Additional fields or values you want to add to the details. These fields are retrieved dynamically from SAP S/4HANA - RFC.

Outputs :

  • Sales Order Data - Details of sales order created in SAP S/4HANA - RFC.
  • Status - If the request is executed successfully, Status is set to “Success”. If there is a failure in SAP S/4HANA - RFC, Status is set to “Error”.
  • Error Message - Reason for error . Populated only when an error occurs.

Error Messages :

  • Encountered an error. Check log for more details.

 

To use this action, the corresponding SAP S/4HANA - RFC connection and credential must be created and associated with the SAP S/4HANA - RFC  Connection & Credential alias. Learn More

Note: Requires a subscription for production use. Read More.

  • Document Partner - Complex object containing these fields:
    • Partner Function
    • Customer
    • Item (SD)
    • Form of address
    • Name
    • Name 2
    • Name 3
    • Name 4
    • Street
    • Country Key
    • Country ISO
    • Postal Code
    • P.O. Box Postal Code
    • P.O. Box city
    • City
    • District
    • Region
    • PO Box
    • Telephone 1
    • Telephone 2
    • Telebox number
    • Fax Number
    • Teletex number
    • Telex number
    • Language Key
    • Lang. (ISO 639)
    • Unloading Point
    • Transportation Zone
    • Tax Jurisdiction
    • Address
    • Home address
    • Address Type
    • Address origin
    • Address no.
    • Object Type
    • Key
    • Logical System
  •  Schedule Lines - Complex object containing these fields:
    • Sales Document Item
    • Schedule Line Number
    • Delivery Date
    • Date type
    • Arrival time
    • Order quantity
    • Delivery block
    • Sched.line category
    • Transptn Plang Date
    • Material Avail. Date
    • Loading Date
    • Goods Issue Date
    • Transp. Plan. Time
    • Matl Staging Time
    • Loading Time
    • Goods Issue Time
    • Object Type
    • Key
    • Logical System
    • Delivery Date
    • Arrival time
    • Rel. Type
    • Schedule line type
  • Additional Fields - Additional fields or values you want to add to the details. These fields are retrieved dynamically from SAP S/4HANA - RFC.

Outputs :

  • Sales Order Data - Details of sales order created in SAP S/4HANA - RFC.
  • Status - If the request is executed successfully, Status is set to “Success”. If there is a failure in SAP S/4HANA - RFC, Status is set to “Error”.
  • Error Message - Reason for error . Populated only when an error occurs.

Error Messages :

  • Encountered an error. Check log for more details.

 

To use this action, the corresponding SAP S/4HANA - RFC connection and credential must be created and associated with the SAP S/4HANA - RFC  Connection & Credential alias. Learn More

Note: Requires a subscription for production use. Read More.
